definition: a soft thin light fabric with a crinkled surface, to curl tightly
details:
noun
- a soft thin light fabric with a crinkled surface
= synonyms: crepe
- small very thin pancake
= synonyms: crepe
verb
- to curl tightly
= synonyms: crimp, kink, frizz, frizzle, kink up
- to cover or drape with crape, a thin, crinkled fabric
= example: to cover or drape with crape, a thin, crinkled fabric
= synonyms: crepe
